title: Verbs & Aspects
summary: Tovian uses a conjugated auxiliary + an infinitive main verb.

title: Mood & Voice
summary: Mood prefixes attach to the auxiliary:

title: Culture
summary: In Tovian culture, memory and dreams are central. This section will collect core vocabulary and common expressions used when speaking about remembrances and dream-signs.

title: Introductions
summary: Polite self-introductions and first phrases. Memory and dreams now live in their own section.

title: Forming Questions
summary: Add `lhan` at the start of a declarative sentence.

title: Attributive Nouns (Adjectives)
summary: Descriptive qualities are expressed as nouns placed after the noun they modify. Order matters.
